name: YOUR STAR - A Sci-Fi
description:
A science fiction. Launch planets into orbit to crash and kill as many Enemies as possible before they greedily deplete your star's hydrogen. Every three waves, you are given an opportunity to upgrade, in which you can choose to improve your abilities or add a new planet to your arsenal. 

Controls: This game can be played with only a mouse or a touchscreen. 

  • Mouse click / tap: launch planet, advance cutscene
  • Key S: take screenshot

Made with Replit
